title: Two illegal fuel resellers nabbed
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Police have arrested a person with 45 liters of bottled petrol prepared for sale in Miriswatte.
Police have continued raids to find illegal fuel resellers, and based on information received had carried out a raid in in a fish stall in the Miriswatta area in Induruwa.
Accordingly, the shop owner has been arrested and is due to be produced before the Balapitiya Magistrate’s Court today (28).
The Ceylon Petroleum Corporation states that the issuance of diesel and petrol to filling stations will continue.

Meanwhile, 35 liters of petrol and 150 liters of kerosene were found in a shop in the Wanathawilluwa area in Puttalam, and Police stated that one suspect has been arrested in connection with the incident.
Moreover, the Ceylon Petroleum Corporation states that the issuance of diesel and petrol to filling stations will continue.
